00030 #ifndef DB_PLANNER_DB_MANAGER_H
00031 #define DB_PLANNER_DB_MANAGER_H
00032 
00033 #include <string>
00034 #include <vector>
00035 #include <utility>
00036 #include "model.h"
00037 #include "grasp.h"
00038 using std::pair;
00039 using std::string;
00040 using std::vector;
00041 
00042 namespace db_planner {
00043 
00046 class FilterList{
00047 public:
00049         enum FilterType{NONE, HAS_HUMAN_GRASPS, HAS_HUMAN_REFINED_GRASPS};
00051         static string GetWhereClause(FilterType filter) {
00052                 if (filter == HAS_HUMAN_GRASPS) {
00053                         return "WHERE model_name IN (SELECT DISTINCT scaled_model_name "
00054                                    "FROM grasp JOIN scaled_model USING(scaled_model_id) "
00055                                    "WHERE grasp_source_id = 2)";
00056                 } else if (filter == HAS_HUMAN_REFINED_GRASPS) {
00057                         return "WHERE model_name IN (SELECT DISTINCT scaled_model_name "
00058                                    "FROM grasp JOIN scaled_model USING(scaled_model_id) "
00059                                    "WHERE grasp_source_id = 3)";
00060                 } else {
00061                         return "";
00062                 }
00063         }
00064 };
00065 
00066 
00068 class DatabaseManager {
00069  public:
00071   virtual bool isConnected() const = 0;
00073 
00075   virtual bool GetAlignment(const Model& source,
00076                             const Model& dest, 
00077                             const string& alignment_method_name, 
00078                             float alignment[16]) const = 0;
00080 
00081   virtual bool SaveAlignment(const Model& source,
00082                              const Model& dest, 
00083                              const string& alignment_method_name, 
00084                              const float alignment[16]) const = 0;
00086 
00088   virtual bool GetNeighbors(const Model& model, 
00089                             const string& distance_function_name, 
00090                             const int num_neighbors,
00091                             vector<pair<Model*, double> >* neighbors) 
00092                             const = 0;
00094   virtual bool SaveNeighbors(const Model& model, 
00095                              const string& distance_function_name, 
00096                              const vector<pair<Model*, double> >& neighbors) 
00097                              const = 0;
00099   virtual bool GetGrasps(const Model& model, 
00100                          const string& hand_name, 
00101                                                          vector<Grasp*>* grasp_list) const = 0;
00103   virtual bool SaveGrasps(const vector<Grasp*>) const = 0;
00105   virtual bool ModelList(vector<Model*>* model_list, 
00106                                                              FilterList::FilterType filter = FilterList::NONE) const = 0;
00108   virtual bool GraspTypeList(vector<string>* type_list) const = 0;
00110   virtual bool DistanceFunctionList(
00111       vector<string>* distance_function_list) const = 0;
00113   virtual bool AlignmentMethodList(
00114       vector<string>* alignment_method_list) const = 0;
00115 };
